attributes.action: stop the road duty in scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: targeting the rural areas where we have no choice but to use these roads this will affect alot of people like the disabled,elderly children and people visiting relatives and hospitals this should be abolished  targeting the rural areas we dont have alot as it is everything is far away we have no choice but to travel to get where we are our amenities are very limited and being charged is not a issue i am completely against this as i am disabled and have no choice but to use the roads to get to my appointments and neccessities

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
